channel.title: Sachseln on Nii's Travel Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Sachseln on Nii's Travel Blog

item.title: Sachseln
item.description: Sachseln is a small town in the geographic centre of Switzerland. A big deal apparently! Only about 5000 people live here. There’s a big church and that’s about it really. The house we’re staying in is pretty amazing, super high tech facilities but also a traditional wooden house. The view from the room The house itself Ancient latch system! Swiss powerpoints confuse me. This was mostly a stop between Jungraujoch and Zurich so we can get a decent rest.
